TestDescription.name: ASP.NET version disclosure
TestDescription.Description: The HTTP responses returned by this web application include anheader named [bold]X-AspNet-Version[/bold]. The value of this header is used by Visual Studio to determine which version of ASP.NET is in use. It is not necessary for production sites and should be disabled.
TestDescription.Impact: The HTTP header may disclose sensitive information. This information can be used to launch further attacks.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Apply the following changes to the web.config file to prevent ASP.NET version disclosure: [pre] <System.Web> <httpRuntime enableVersionHeader="false" /> </System.Web> [/pre]
